description.text: How does use-to-earn reward you if you enact TiUSD transfer?
In principle, the more USDC you transfer, the more rewards you will earn. Do notice that your transfer to TiTi-AMMs contract will not be regarded as valid.

The use-to-earn module will record your TiUSD transfer volume in the past 24hrs. Subsequently, the protocol will calculate how many rewards you'll earn according to your proportion among all users' TiSUD transfer volume. Moreover, the protocol will restart the rewards distribution calculation every 24 hrs.
